ygData.subject: Re: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Woohoo. Congrats. Since I started a full time job again recently I haven t been able to play long enough to be able to organise a party to even try. Also,
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Sep 09/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> P.S. to jhenders i finally got a ykesha last week to replace one of my wakis
> =) pretty close to dueling yaks cause the second hand doesn't proc as much
> anyway and waki has same dmg/del ratio.

Woohoo. Congrats. Since I started a full time job again recently I
haven't been able to play long enough to be able to organise a party to
even try. Also, when I do log in, seems like most of my friends are
either playing second characters or out hunting lower level mobs to
twink said characters. Since the last fear plane nerfing the amount of
things for L50 chars to do is pretty dismal. I find this especially a
problem with our class. If I was a cleric I could at least wander around
and cast heals and buffs on random newbies when I was bored, but as
people need to be grouped to benefit from our songs there's really not
much we can do on that score.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
